page.description: The Path Control allows you to select a folder. One or more Path Select controls may appear inside the Format section of a UI_DLG_BOX() or UI_MODELESS_DLG_BOX() function.
page.syntax: [%p=UI_GET_PATH( Title, Drive, Starting_Folder );I= Icon %. Width Path ]

argument.name: Title
argument.description: Character. The title of the dialog box.

argument.name: Drive
argument.description: Character. The drive portion of the path to display.

argument.name: Starting_Folder
argument.description: Character. The directory portion of the path to display.

argument.name: Icon
argument.description: Character. The icon to show on the control.

argument.name: Width
argument.description: Numeric. The width of the control.

argument.name: Path
argument.description: Character. The variable that contains selected path.
